item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

Here is blue nomad cape and nomad himself, i dont got the drop model for cape soz.

picture:

ints:
Cape ints:

if(i == 18046) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 45576; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 680; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 45576; //Male class8.anInt200 = 45576; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Blue cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Like red, but blue.".getBytes(); }

NPC ints:

if(i == 62) { // NPC ID aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; // Number of models the NPC uses class5.anIntArray94[0] = 45697; // MODEL class5.aString65 = "Nomad"; // NPC name class5.aByteArray89 = "Nomad.".getBytes(); // NPC description class5.anInt61 = 699; //combat level }

http://uppit.com/xb3j0he5xswq/nomad.rar

have fun with them
